00007 -(NSArray *)collect:(NSArray *)views {
00008         NSMutableArray *array = [NSMutableArray array];
00009         for (UIView *v in views) {
00010                 UIView *sv = v.superview;
00011                 while (sv != nil) {
00012                         [array addObject:sv];
00013                         sv = sv.superview;
00014                 }
00015         }
00016         return array;
00017 }

00019 @end
